title: League of Legends caused ACCESS_VIOLATION in module League of Legends- GAME CRASH/Help!
body:
My game crashes once loading screen starts and goes straight to Bugsplat. Even when I restart the league client and try to reconnect it does the same thing and sends me back to bugsplat ;/

I checked out the league file and went to Riot Games

replies.body:
go to game folder and search for the following configuration files : 
 **PersistedSettings.json **and  **game.cfg** 

close the game and delete them then run the game. that should solve your problem. 
 if it works for you please do reply.
 **P.S: deleting those files will reset your In game settings to default.**
Wanted to give you a heads up that I used your solution after everything else had failed and it fixed my client. Thanks man.

FYI there was a patch this morning and I got this error after multiple bug splats (and pc restart, open as admin, etc). I didn't want to do a full repair since my internet is garbage and it would take forever. So I did this... and it worked! Thanks!

You are the savior. My game is fixed now. 
Big thumbs up for my boy Dodinj2 :)
I've had this for a week now and never knew what it was until today and this fixed it right up :D
I just ran into this issue and this is the correct fix.  Thank you.
This is the correct fix for this, thank you very much dude, you know more about what's going on than Riot's own support staff it seems

What a legend! totally fixed my issue. Thought it was related to something like this because I normally use an external monitor and experienced the game crashing when I tried using my surface monitor. Thankyou. Leon
Wow, worked for me too. How doesn't RIOT support know to do this?

It sounds like there might be some corrupt game files that failing to render the game properly, and causing it to crash.  As a first step, I suggest going over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide.  Hopefully, this will get you fixed up and back in game asap!
